analysis.description:
E4Lava.optInFromClassic (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol#518-560) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _toks == 0
	- iclassic.balanceOf(nrequester) == 0

Reentrancy in E4Lava.optInFromClassic (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol#518-560):
	External calls:
	- _toks = iclassic.balanceOf(nrequester) (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol#540)
	- iclassic.transferFrom.gas(optInGas)(nrequester,oldE4RecycleBin,_toks) (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol#548-550)
	- iclassic.balanceOf(nrequester) == 0 (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol#551-560)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holderAccounts (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol#555)
	- holderAccounts (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol#555-560)
	- holderAccounts (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol)
	- holderAccounts (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol)

E4Lava.optInFromClassic (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol#518-560) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-iclassic.transferFrom.gas(optInGas)(nrequester,oldE4RecycleBin,_toks) (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol#548-550)

Reentrancy in E4Lava.optInFromClassic (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol#518-560):
	External calls:
	- _toks = iclassic.balanceOf(nrequester) (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol#540)
	- iclassic.transferFrom.gas(optInGas)(nrequester,oldE4RecycleBin,_toks) (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol#548-550)
	- iclassic.balanceOf(nrequester) == 0 (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol#551-560)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holderIndexes (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol#555)
	- numAccounts (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol#555)
	- numToksSwitchedOver (/unique_contracts/0xd87c91884f5796e7b0a7ee8cc5d40ad6c63f289d.sol)
